Glial Cell.DefiningCitation: Andriezen WL. The Neuroglia Elements in the Human Brain. Br Med J. 1893 Jul 29;2(1700):227-30. PubMed PMID: 20754383; PubMed Central PMCID: PMC2422013.
Glial Cell.Definition: A non-neuronal cell of the nervous system. They not only provide physical support, but also respond to injury, regulate the ionic and chemical composition of the extracellular milieu. Guide neuronal migration during development, and exchange metabolites with neurons.
